meanings.sent1: The singers dueted beautifully on stage.
meanings.sent2: They dueted together at the concert last night.
meanings.sent3: The birds dueted in perfect harmony, creating a melodious tune.
meanings.sent4: The two dancers dueted like a well-choreographed ballet.
meanings.sent5: The actors dueted with such passion that the audience was moved to tears.
